channel.title: How do i become an administrator?
channel.description:
heyia people, I use the phonescape server! ....now. . . I downloaded it.. I go into the administrator's note pad thingo..it has the following names: Pimp baller god
when I add my name. . or replace one it dosent show me as an admin .. can you please help ? ?

item.title: How do i become an administrator?
item.dc:creator: @dirk dirk
item.description:
@dirk wrote:

Go into characters folder, find ur name and change this:

character-rights = 0

to this:

character-rights = 2

or if u want somone to be mod this:

character-rights = 1

Read full topic
item.source: How do i become an administrator?

item.title: How do i become an administrator?
item.dc:creator: @devindagod devindagod
item.description:
@devindagod wrote:

Do you have the code so u can see your own crown or are you just asking a friend?

Read full topic
